destinations.name: Paris, France
destinations.description: Experience the City of Lights with its iconic Eiffel Tower, romantic cafes, and rich art culture.

destinations.name: Tokyo, Japan
destinations.description: Explore Japan’s vibrant capital—where futuristic technology meets ancient traditions and world-class cuisine.

destinations.name: New York City, USA
destinations.description: Discover the Big Apple, home to Times Square, Broadway, and an endless skyline that never sleeps.

destinations.name: Cape Town, South Africa
destinations.description: A coastal gem at the foot of Table Mountain, offering ocean views, culture, and stunning wildlife.

destinations.name: Sydney, Australia
destinations.description: Visit the Sydney Opera House, enjoy sunny beaches, and explore vibrant harbor life.

destinations.name: Rome, Italy
destinations.description: Walk through ancient history in Rome—home to the Colosseum, Roman Forum, and incredible Italian cuisine.

destinations.name: Dubai, UAE
destinations.description: A luxury city blending desert adventures, futuristic skyscrapers, and world-class shopping.

destinations.name: Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
destinations.description: Dance to the rhythm of samba, relax on Copacabana Beach, and marvel at Christ the Redeemer.
